text: PFC Minyor Bobov dol (ПФК Миньор Бобов дол) is a Bulgarian football club from the town of Bobov dol, currently playing in the Bulgarian South-West V AFG, the third division of Bulgarian football. ==Honours== * Seventh place in the "B" group: 2004/05 * 1/8 finalist in the National Cup tournament: this time its official name is the Cup of Bulgaria 2004/05 == External links == *bgclubs.eu webpage Minyor Category:Mining association football clubs in Bulgaria
title: PFC Minyor Bobov Dol
